Class.Name: NSTextView
Class.Description: A view that draws text and handles user interactions with that text.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithFrame:textContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes a text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithFrame:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes a text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithCoder:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes a text view with data in an unarchiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: replaceTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Replaces the text container for the group of text system objects containing the receiver, keeping the association between the receiver and its layout manager intact.

InstanceMethods.Name: invalidateTextContainerOrigin
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates the calculated origin of the text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: changeDocumentBackgroundColor:
InstanceMethods.Description: An action method used to set the background color.

InstanceMethods.Name: setNeedsDisplayInRect:avoidAdditionalLayout:
InstanceMethods.Description: Marks the receiver as requiring display.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawInsertionPointInRect:color:turnedOn:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws or erases the insertion point.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawViewBackgroundInRect:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws the background of the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: setConstrainedFrameSize:
InstanceMethods.Description: Attempts to set the frame size as if by user action.

InstanceMethods.Name: cleanUpAfterDragOperation
InstanceMethods.Description: Releases the drag information still existing after the dragging session has completed.

InstanceMethods.Name: showFindIndicatorForRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Causes a temporary highlighting effect to appear around the visible portion (or portions) of the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertText:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts aString into the receiver’s text at the insertion point if there is one, otherwise replacing the selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: setBaseWritingDirection:range:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the base writing direction of a range of text.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleBaseWritingDirection:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the base writing direction of a paragraph between left-to-right and right-to-left.

InstanceMethods.Name: outline:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds the outline attribute to the selected text attributes if absent; removes the attribute if present.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticQuoteSubstitution:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the state of automatic quotation mark substitution from enabled to disabled and vice versa.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticLinkDetection:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the state of automatic link detection from enabled to disabled and vice versa.

InstanceMethods.Name: setSelectedRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Selects the specified range of characters in response to user action.

InstanceMethods.Name: setSelectedRange:affinity:stillSelecting:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the selection to a range of characters in response to user action.

InstanceMethods.Name: setSelectedRanges:affinity:stillSelecting:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the selection to the characters in an array of ranges in response to user action.

InstanceMethods.Name: updateInsertionPointStateAndRestartTimer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Updates the insertion point’s location and optionally restarts the blinking cursor timer.

InstanceMethods.Name: characterIndexForInsertionAtPoint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a character index appropriate for placing a zero-length selection for an insertion point associated with the mouse at the given point.

InstanceMethods.Name: preferredPasteboardTypeFromArray:restrictedToTypesFromArray:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whatever type on the pasteboard would be most preferred for copying data.

InstanceMethods.Name: readSelectionFromPasteboard:
InstanceMethods.Description: Reads the text view’s preferred type of data from the specified pasteboard.

InstanceMethods.Name: readSelectionFromPasteboard:type:
InstanceMethods.Description: Reads data of the given type from the specified pasteboard.

InstanceMethods.Name: writeSelectionToPasteboard:type:
InstanceMethods.Description: Writes the current selection to the specified pasteboard using the given type.

InstanceMethods.Name: writeSelectionToPasteboard:types:
InstanceMethods.Description: Writes the current selection to the specified pasteboard under each given type.

InstanceMethods.Name: validRequestorForSendType:returnType:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns self if the text view can provide and accept the specified data types, or nil if it can't.

InstanceMethods.Name: alignJustified:
InstanceMethods.Description: Applies full justification to selected paragraphs (or all text, if the receiver is a plain text object).

InstanceMethods.Name: changeAttributes:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the attributes of the current selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: changeColor:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the color of the selected text.

InstanceMethods.Name: setAlignment:range:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the alignment of the paragraphs containing characters in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: useStandardKerning:
InstanceMethods.Description: Set the receiver to use pair kerning data for the glyphs in its selection, or for all glyphs if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: lowerBaseline:
InstanceMethods.Description: Lowers the baseline offset of selected text by 1 point, or of all text if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: raiseBaseline:
InstanceMethods.Description: Raises the baseline offset of selected text by 1 point, or of all text if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: turnOffKerning:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the receiver to use nominal glyph spacing for the glyphs in its selection, or for all glyphs if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: loosenKerning:
InstanceMethods.Description: Increases the space between glyphs in the receiver’s selection, or in all text if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: tightenKerning:
InstanceMethods.Description: Decreases the space between glyphs in the receiver’s selection, or for all glyphs if the receiver is a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: useStandardLigatures:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the receiver to use the standard ligatures available for the fonts and languages used when setting text, for the glyphs in the selection if the receiver is a rich text view, or for all glyphs if it’s a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: turnOffLigatures:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the receiver to use only required ligatures when setting text, for the glyphs in the selection if the receiver is a rich text view, or for all glyphs if it’s a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: useAllLigatures:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the receiver to use all ligatures available for the fonts and languages used when setting text, for the glyphs in the selection if the receiver is a rich text view, or for all glyphs if it’s a plain text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleTraditionalCharacterShape:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles the NSCharacterShapeAttributeName attribute at the current selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: clickedOnLink:atIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Causes the text view to act as if the user clicked on some text with the given link as the value of a link attribute associated with the text.

InstanceMethods.Name: pasteAsPlainText:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts the contents of the pasteboard into the receiver’s text as plain text.

InstanceMethods.Name: pasteAsRichText:
InstanceMethods.Description: This action method inserts the contents of the pasteboard into the receiver’s text as rich text, maintaining its attributes.

InstanceMethods.Name: breakUndoCoalescing
InstanceMethods.Description: Informs the receiver that it should begin coalescing successive typing operations in a new undo grouping.

InstanceMethods.Name: updateFontPanel
InstanceMethods.Description: Updates the Font panel to contain the font attributes of the selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: updateRuler
InstanceMethods.Description: Updates the ruler view in the receiver’s enclosing scroll view to reflect the selection’s paragraph and marker attributes.

InstanceMethods.Name: updateDragTypeRegistration
InstanceMethods.Description: Updates the acceptable drag types of all text views associated with the receiver's layout manager.

InstanceMethods.Name: selectionRangeForProposedRange:granularity:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an adjusted selected range based on the selection granularity.

InstanceMethods.Name: shouldChangeTextInRange:replacementString:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initiates a series of delegate messages (and general notifications) to determine whether modifications can be made to the characters and attributes of the receiver’s text.

InstanceMethods.Name: shouldChangeTextInRanges:replacementStrings:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initiates a series of delegate messages (and general notifications) to determine whether modifications can be made to the characters and attributes of the receiver’s text.

InstanceMethods.Name: didChangeText
InstanceMethods.Description: Sends out necessary notifications when a text change completes.

InstanceMethods.Name: smartDeleteRangeForProposedRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an extended range that includes adjacent whitespace that should be deleted along with the proposed range in order to preserve proper spacing and punctuation.

InstanceMethods.Name: smartInsertAfterStringForString:replacingRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns any whitespace that needs to be added after the string to preserve proper spacing and punctuation when the string replaces the characters in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: smartInsertBeforeStringForString:replacingRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns any whitespace that needs to be added before the string to preserve proper spacing and punctuation when the string replaces the characters in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: smartInsertForString:replacingRange:beforeString:afterString:
InstanceMethods.Description: Determines whether whitespace needs to be added around the string to preserve proper spacing and punctuation when it replaces the characters in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleSmartInsertDelete:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the state of smart insert and delete from enabled to disabled and vice versa.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleContinuousSpellChecking:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles whether continuous spell checking is enabled for the receiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleGrammarChecking:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the state of grammar checking from enabled to disabled and vice versa.

InstanceMethods.Name: setSpellingState:range:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the spelling state, which controls the display of the spelling and grammar indicators on the given text range.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontSharingServicePicker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates and displays a new instance of the sharing service picker.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:didMoveMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Modifies the paragraph style of the paragraphs containing the selection to record the new location of the marker.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:willMoveMarker:toLocation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a potentially modified location to which the marker should be moved.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:shouldMoveMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whether the marker should be moved.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:didRemoveMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Modifies the paragraph style of the paragraphs containing the selection—if possible—by removing the specified marker.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:shouldRemoveMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whether the marker should be removed.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:didAddMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Modifies the paragraph style of the paragraphs containing the selection to accommodate a new marker.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:shouldAddMarker:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whether a new marker can be added.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:willAddMarker:atLocation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a potentially modified location to which the marker should be added.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerView:handleMouseDown:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds a left tab marker to the ruler at the location clicked.

InstanceMethods.Name: dragImageForSelectionWithEvent:origin:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an appropriate drag image for the drag initiated by the specified event.

InstanceMethods.Name: dragOperationForDraggingInfo:type:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the type of drag operation that should be performed if the image were released now.

InstanceMethods.Name: dragSelectionWithEvent:offset:slideBack:
InstanceMethods.Description: Begins dragging the current selected text range.

InstanceMethods.Name: startSpeaking:
InstanceMethods.Description: Speaks the selected text, or all text if no selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: stopSpeaking:
InstanceMethods.Description: Stops the speaking of text.

InstanceMethods.Name: performFindPanelAction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Performs a find panel action specified by the sender's tag.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontLinkPanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: Brings forward a panel allowing the user to manipulate links in the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontListPanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: Brings forward a panel allowing the user to manipulate text lists in the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontSpacingPanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: Brings forward a panel allowing the user to manipulate text line heights, interline spacing, and paragraph spacing, in the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontTablePanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: Brings forward a panel allowing the user to manipulate text tables in the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: orderFrontSubstitutionsPanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: Brings forward a panel allowing the user to specify string substitutions in the text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: complete:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invokes completion in a text view.

InstanceMethods.Name: completionsForPartialWordRange:indexOfSelectedItem:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an array of potential completions, in the order to be presented, representing possible word completions available from a partial word.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertCompletion:forPartialWordRange:movement:isFinal:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts the selected completion into the text at the appropriate location.

InstanceMethods.Name: checkTextInDocument:
InstanceMethods.Description: Performs the default text checking on the entire document.

InstanceMethods.Name: checkTextInSelection:
InstanceMethods.Description: Performs the default text checking on the current selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: checkTextInRange:types:options:
InstanceMethods.Description: Check and replace the text in the range using the specified checking types and options.

InstanceMethods.Name: handleTextCheckingResults:forRange:types:options:orthography:wordCount:
InstanceMethods.Description: Handles the text checking results returned by the text view

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticDashSubstitution:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles the state of the automatic dash substitution.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticDataDetection:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles the state of the automatic data detection.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticSpellingCorrection:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles the state of the automatic spelling correction.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleAutomaticTextReplacement:
InstanceMethods.Description: Toggles the state of the automatic text replacement.

InstanceMethods.Name: performValidatedReplacementInRange:withAttributedString:
InstanceMethods.Description: Replaces text in the range you specify with the attributed string you provide.

InstanceMethods.Name: updateQuickLookPreviewPanel
InstanceMethods.Description: Notifies the QuickLook panel that an update may be required.

InstanceMethods.Name: toggleQuickLookPreviewPanel:
InstanceMethods.Description: An action message that toggles the visibility state of the Quick Look preview panel.

InstanceMethods.Name: quickLookPreviewableItemsInRanges:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an array of URLs for items that can be displayed by QuickLook in the specified ranges.

InstanceMethods.Name: changeLayoutOrientation:
InstanceMethods.Description: An action method that sets the layout orientation of the text.

InstanceMethods.Name: setLayoutOrientation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Changes the receiver's layout orientation and invalidates the contents.

InstanceProperties.Name: delegate
InstanceProperties.Description: The delegate for all text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager.

InstanceProperties.Name: textContainer
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: textContainerInset
InstanceProperties.Description: The empty space the receiver leaves around its associated text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: textContainerOrigin
InstanceProperties.Description: The origin of the receiver’s text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: textLayoutManager
InstanceProperties.Description: The manager that lays out text for the receiver’s text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: layoutManager
InstanceProperties.Description: The layout manager that lays out text for the receiver’s text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: textContentStorage
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s text storage object.

InstanceProperties.Name: textStorage
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s text storage object.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s background color.

InstanceProperties.Name: drawsBackground
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver draws its background.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsDocumentBackgroundColorChange
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver allows its background color to change.

InstanceProperties.Name: shouldDrawInsertionPoint
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that determines whether the receiver should draw its insertion point.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowedInputSourceLocales
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of locale identifiers representing input sources that are allowed to be enabled when the receiver has the keyboard focus.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsUndo
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver allows undo.

InstanceProperties.Name: editable
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager allow the user to edit text.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectable
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager allow the user to select text.

InstanceProperties.Name: fieldEditor
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager behave as field editors.

InstanceProperties.Name: richText
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager allow the user to apply attributes to specific ranges of text.

InstanceProperties.Name: importsGraphics
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager allow the user to import files by dragging.

InstanceProperties.Name: defaultParagraphStyle
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s default paragraph style.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsImageEditing
InstanceProperties.Description: Indicates whether image attachments should permit editing of their images.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that enables and disables automatic quotation mark substitution.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticLinkDetectionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that enables or disables automatic link detection.

InstanceProperties.Name: displaysLinkToolTips
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view automatically supplies the destination of a link as a tooltip for text that has a link attribute.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticTextCompletionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean vlaue that inidcates whether the text view supplies autocompletion suggestions as the user types.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesAdaptiveColorMappingForDarkAppearance
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean vlaues that indicates whether the framework should use adaptive color mapping for dark appearance.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesRuler
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager use a ruler.

InstanceProperties.Name: rulerVisible
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the scroll view enclosing text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager displays the ruler.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesInspectorBar
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether this text view uses the inspector bar.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectedRanges
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing the ranges of characters selected in the receiver’s layout manager.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectionAffinity
InstanceProperties.Description: The preferred direction of selection.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectionGranularity
InstanceProperties.Description: The selection granularity for subsequent extension of a selection.

InstanceProperties.Name: insertionPointColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The color of the insertion point.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectedTextAttributes
InstanceProperties.Description: The attributes used to indicate the selection.

InstanceProperties.Name: markedTextAttributes
InstanceProperties.Description: The attributes used to draw marked text.

InstanceProperties.Name: linkTextAttributes
InstanceProperties.Description: The attributes used to draw the onscreen presentation of link text.

InstanceProperties.Name: readablePasteboardTypes
InstanceProperties.Description: The types this text view can read immediately from the pasteboard.

InstanceProperties.Name: writablePasteboardTypes
InstanceProperties.Description: The pasteboard types that can be provided from the current selection.

InstanceProperties.Name: typingAttributes
InstanceProperties.Description: The receiver’s typing attributes.

InstanceProperties.Name: coalescingUndo
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether undo coalescing is in progress.

InstanceProperties.Name: acceptableDragTypes
InstanceProperties.Description: The data types that the receiver accepts as the destination view of a dragging operation.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangeForUserCharacterAttributeChange
InstanceProperties.Description: The range of characters affected by an action method that changes character (not paragraph) attributes.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangesForUserCharacterAttributeChange
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing the ranges of characters affected by an action method that changes character (not paragraph) attributes.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangeForUserParagraphAttributeChange
InstanceProperties.Description: The range of characters affected by an action method that changes paragraph (not character) attributes.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangesForUserParagraphAttributeChange
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing the ranges of characters affected by a method that changes paragraph (not character) attributes.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangeForUserTextChange
InstanceProperties.Description: The range of characters affected by a method that changes characters (as opposed to attributes).

InstanceProperties.Name: rangesForUserTextChange
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing the ranges of characters affected by a method that changes characters (as opposed to attributes).

InstanceProperties.Name: smartInsertDeleteEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the receiver inserts or deletes space around selected words so as to preserve proper spacing and punctuation.

InstanceProperties.Name: continuousSpellCheckingEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has continuous spell checking enabled.

InstanceProperties.Name: spellCheckerDocumentTag
InstanceProperties.Description: A tag identifying the text view's text as a document for the spell checker server.

InstanceProperties.Name: grammarCheckingEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: Enables and disables grammar checking.

InstanceProperties.Name: acceptsGlyphInfo
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver accepts the glyph info attribute.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesFontPanel
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager use the Font panel and Font menu.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesFindPanel
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver allows for a find panel.

InstanceProperties.Name: rangeForUserCompletion
InstanceProperties.Description: The partial range from the most recent beginning of a word up to the insertion point.

InstanceProperties.Name: enabledTextCheckingTypes
InstanceProperties.Description: The default text checking types.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticDashSubstitutionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether automatic dash substitution is enabled.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticDataDetectionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether automatic data detection is enabled.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticSpellingCorrectionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether automatic spelling correction is enabled.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticTextReplacementEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether automatic text replacement is enabled.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesFindBar
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use the find bar for this text view.

InstanceProperties.Name: incrementalSearchingEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether incremental searching is enabled.

TypeMethods.Name: registerForServices
TypeMethods.Description: Registers send and return types for the Services facility.
